title: Sports betting analysis
text: goal winaRaque explore sport data make analysis sport betting odds. first analyzes done NBA.

title: Sports betting analysis
text: can install development version winaRaque GitHub :

title: Sports betting analysis
text: can get NBA results 1/2 odds day.

title: Sports betting analysis
code: # the workflow has been taking the odds since 2023-03-20 seq_date <- seq.Date(from = as.Date("2023-10-24"), # NBA opening 2023-2024                      to = Sys.Date(),                      by = "day") list_results <- lapply(seq_date, get_nba_scores, pivot_results = TRUE) results <- do.call("rbind", list_results) library(ggplot2) library(dplyr)  results %>%   ggplot(aes(x = Name, y = Odd, color = WINLOSE)) +   geom_boxplot() +   theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, vjust = 0.5)) +   ggtitle("Odds distribution according to result", subtitle = "by teams - season 2023-2024")

title: Sports betting analysis
text: workflow run everyday get NBA odds night. results inst/extdata. workflow run every morning collect odds shiny app. results shiny folder.

title: Sports betting analysis
text: Shiny app explore ‘surbet’ variations games 1/2 sports (tennis, basketball, baseball). Run Shiny app app.R.

code: if (FALSE) { get_nba_scores("2023-03-21")  # Try pivot_results feature get_nba_scores("2023-03-21", pivot_results = TRUE)  # Try with many dates seq_date <- seq.Date(from = as.Date("2023-03-24"),                      to = as.Date("2023-03-27 "),                      by = "day") list_results <- lapply(seq_date, get_nba_scores, pivot_results = TRUE) results <- do.call("rbind", list_results) }

code: library(rvest) library(xml2) library(jsonlite)  # Tennis bets for next 3 hours: get_sport_df(sport = "Tennis", bet_status = "PREMATCH", next_hours = 3) #> # A tibble: 7 × 13 #> # Rowwise:  #>   matchId  status   mainBetId sportId title      Competitor1_Id Competitor1_Name #>   <chr>    <chr>    <chr>     <chr>   <chr>      <chr>          <chr>            #> 1 48564305 PREMATCH 312933918 5       Matteo Ar… 505550         Matteo Arnaldi   #> 2 48564307 PREMATCH 312909064 5       Tomas Mac… 300540         Tomas Machac     #> 3 48564301 PREMATCH 312908836 5       Tallon Gr… 122368         Tallon Griekspo… #> 4 48553925 PREMATCH 312947104 5       Caroline … 42339          Caroline Garcia  #> 5 48564303 PREMATCH 312898572 5       Martin Da… 51345          Martin Damm Jr   #> 6 48564249 PREMATCH 312908308 5       Nicolas J… 89632          Nicolas Jarry    #> 7 48553921 PREMATCH 312979134 5       Danielle … 58515          Danielle Collins #> # ℹ 6 more variables: Competitor1_OddPreMatch <dbl>, Competitor2_Id <chr>, #> #   Competitor2_Name <chr>, Competitor2_OddPreMatch <dbl>, matchStart <dttm>, #> #   time_scrap <dttm>
